nodes.text: Star Wars: Saga Legends is an action figure line manufactured by Hasbro Inc. in 2013.

The Saga Legends title was originally used to describe subsets of Hasbro's 30th Anniversary Collection, The Legacy Collection, and Star Wars Rebels toy lines. The 2013 assortment was the first released apart from another line.
Note that most of the toys included an assortment number that included SL before a two digit number printed on the packaging. (SL02, SL11, etc.)
